Why am I seeing this ad?

You are seeing this ad based on your navigation on our website and the search criteria that you have used.

Certain data about the property will be shared with Belfius to pre-fill their mortgage simulation funnel and make things easier for you. This data won't be stored by Belfius and you can adapt them if needed.

This ad is paid by Belfius.
Why am I seeing this ad?

You are seeing this ad based on your navigation on our website and the search criteria that you have used.

Certain data about the property will be shared with Belfius to pre-fill their mortgage simulation funnel and make things easier for you. This data won't be stored by Belfius and you can adapt them if needed.

This ad is paid by Belfius.

The P score represents the flood risk for plots (land) and is composed of 4 classes (A to D):

Class A: no modeled flooding;

Class B: low flood risk under 2050 climate change;

Class C: low risk of flooding in the current climate;

Class D: medium risk of flooding in the current climate.

The G score represents the flood risk for buildings over 25m² and composed of 4 classes (A to D):

Class A: no modeled flooding;

Class B: low flood risk under 2050 climate change;

Class C: low risk of flooding in the current climate;

Class D: medium risk of flooding in the current climate.

Why am I seeing this ad?

You are seeing this ad based on your navigation on our website and the search criteria that you have used.

Certain data about the property will be shared with Belfius to pre-fill their mortgage simulation funnel and make things easier for you. This data won't be stored by Belfius and you can adapt them if needed.
